}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== ===Notes=== "210-000366 REV.003" and "12.20.07" is silkscreened :on the board in the images below.
===General=== *M/N: V-UCU56, P/N: 860-000095
:AT27LV520 is ATMEL Corporation - 512K 64K x 8 :Multiplexed Addresses/Outputs Low Voltage OTP EPROM
====Audio==== The device returns Mono (PCM, 16kHz) audio.
====Optics==== *It has an exchangeable objective lens. *Focus is adjusted manually.
====Controls==== *Brightness, Contrast, Saturation *White Balance Temperature, Auto *Gain, Power Line Frequency *White Balance Temperature *Sharpness, Backlight Compensation *Exposure (Auto, Absolute, Auto Priority) *LED1 Mode, LED1 Frequency *Disable video processing, Raw bits per pixel
====Extension units==== * 82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d221e * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d221f]] * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d2252]]
Marked as undefined: * [[82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d2250]] * 82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d2251 * 82066163-7050-ab49-b8cc-b3855e8d2255
====Bugs==== *Setting audio capture to 100% will disable audio. :It is hardware bug, workaround is available for linux. *Firmware provide wrong number of audio levels: provided ~6400; :real ~14. workaround is available for linux.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> File:Logitech - QuickCam E 3500 - int front.jpg File:Logitech - QuickCam E 3500 - int front2.jpg File:Logitech - QuickCam E 3500 - int front3.jpg File:Logitech - QuickCam E 3500 - int back.jpg </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
